name: Flatump
description:
New Time Killer Game is released!
The heigher you get, the more difficult game is!
Try to avoid as many obstacles as possible.
Guns and thorns will try to tear you into pieces, don't let them!
Bounce, jump and dodge: everything in this arcade Game.
Collect the coins to unlock all balls.
Game Features:
• Free to play
• Simple control: Jump Left or Jump Right
• Time killer
